description: group of identical soldiers--some wearing helmets of armor, others wearing tall black caps--all wearing red loincloths with heavily tattooed bodies with blue curving forms and orange flames, with spears, arrows and bows, with some riding brown horses, being overtaken by identical heavyset nude women reaching toward them and pulling them down; all figures have blank eyes rimmed in orange; lavender and slate grey background with six giant pelvis bones with long femurs attached, with grey and gold
title: Heike Clan Escaping from Kyoto (Heike miyako-ochi)
